title: World Series Debating: That Football is Stupid
creator_credit: Andrew Denton, Ted Robinson, Joe Murray, Australian Broadcasting Corporation and Wendy Harmer
brief_description: One of the most popular events of the annual Melbourne Comedy Festival, the debate was filmed over several years by ABC TV. Campbell McComas introduces two teams of 3 people consisting of Wendy Harmer, Edmund Capon, Lex Marinos, HG Nelson, Laurie Lawrence, Andrew Denton. The topic of this debate is that football is stupid.
